author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons were killed in two different accidents in Kanyakumari district since Friday evening.

Police sources said two youths – F. Vijay (20) of Palliyadi and Pradeep (17) of Kanchirakode near Thuckalay – were killed when the bike in which they were riding rammed an autorickshaw from behind, on their way to Marthandam.

The duo were thrown at a distance.

While Vijay died on the spot, Pradeep succumbed to his injuries at a hospital in Thiruvananthapuram on Friday night.

Thuckalay police registered a case and are investigating.

In another accident, Pachi (60) of Parakkinkal area near Nagercoil was killed in an accident near the Derik junction on Saturday morning.

A speeding auto dashed against Mr. Pachi and he died instantly. The Nagercoil traffic investigation team has registered a case and are investigating.
title: Three killed in two accidents
